website_summaries.verdict: This affordable knife comes with a razor-sharp edge that slices like a dream.
pros: This handy little knife comes with a super sharp blade that cuts through tomatoes, bread rolls, and other tough to slice foods easily
It also comes with a protective sheath to keep the blade sharp and help prevent injury
cons: So lightweight that it feels a bit flimsy and the blade is not long enough for bigger jobs

customer_reviews.title: Had one of these
customer_reviews.text: knives a while ago, in red, and decided to get one. Glad it comes in black because I'm removing all the colored cutlery (mostly paring knives) from the kitchen. Knife itself cuts tomatoes well. Guess if you're not careful, you could easily slice through a finger. Textured plastic makes this better than the KR tom knife. Handles well and sits well in my hand. Based on my memory of my old Messermeister serrated knife,, the plastic on this is much rougher around the seams, especially noticeable on the protective sheath. Fine where the sheath is concerned, but would prefer not to see hanging plastic on the handle. Best in its price range.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these for awhile and as long as you dry them 100% before putting them back in their red sheath, they will last a long time. I bought 3 of them and put one in the dishwasher then noticed it rusted. I was able to use a brillo pad and get the rust off, so now I handwash and dry them and use them often.
customer_reviews.author: SoccerMommaMia

customer_reviews.title: Belongs on any knife block
customer_reviews.text: This little red knife has quickly become one of the most-used on our knife-block. My father adores heirloom tomatoes, and comes home from the farmer's market with huge bags filled with them, every Sunday the entire time they are in season. I bought this knife for him a few years back -- the reviews were great, and I figured that if it turned out to be junk, I'd only be out twelve bucks, and could always upgrade to a higher price-point if necessary. It has exceeded all reasonable expectations. It's still sharp as the day it came in the mail, and it cuts tomatoes perfectly. I recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Julia B.

customer_reviews.title: This it the best knife for cutting tomatoes. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a wonderful little knife. I have had it almost 2 years and love it every time I use it. It easily slices through food leaving a clean edge without pressing it down. The case helps keep it in good condition. Great for cutting soft items that can give when trying to cut. It is the only knife I use for my tomatoes now. Love, love, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Majors

customer_reviews.title: This is the best small slicing knife we have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the best small slicing knife we have ever owned. We now have four of them and they are the knife of choice every time it's a small item to cut. I wish they came in larger sizes..
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little knife
customer_reviews.text: I found one of these a few years ago at a kitchen supply store and it has become one of our favorite knives. It works great for tomatoes and other soft produce. We love it so much I've gifted four of them. The holder is a good feature because this cute little puppy is SHARP. You really wouldn't want to fumble for it in a drawer without the holder.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: I love the red color makes it easy to find
customer_reviews.text: I got this knife 4 years ago and use it everyday and not just for tomatoes. It is my go- to knife. I love the red color makes it easy to find. Last Christmas I decided to buy another one because two is better than one and WOW was that new one sharp! I thought my 4 year old one was plenty sharp, the new one is almost dangerous sharp. Because of the great price I gave out 6 for Christmas gifts and each person responded it is now their go-to knife. Buy It, buy two, you will be happy you did.
customer_reviews.author: chriscall73

customer_reviews.title: Love this little knife!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little knife! Slices tomatoes perfectly and works well for many jobs. Always sharp- sharp enough to bite you if you are not paying attention. I now more than one....just in case!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse'sGirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tomato Knife
customer_reviews.text: This knife is of good quality, nice red color, attractive sheath cover, and durable blade. It is a little light in weight, and the overall size is a bit smaller than anticipated, but otherwise we are pleased with the knife. We will use it for tomatoes, vegetables, some breads, etc. It has the appearance of a good quality knife.
customer_reviews.author: homer

customer_reviews.title: My #1 knife
customer_reviews.text: This is the knife I use throughout the day, every day in my kitchen. I love it. I try to keep three at all times because they are always in use, but they keep "walking away!" People love this knife. Ordering another one!!
customer_reviews.author: Susie Q

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp
customer_reviews.text: Used for slicing tomatoes and other softer skin foods. Cuts well and effortless... watch out that you don't slice your fingers or your fingernails. Good handle and light weight for comfortable use
customer_reviews.author: Richard Strauss

customer_reviews.title: Best tomato knife ever
customer_reviews.text: This our second tomato knife and it is very sharp with a little flexability. Perfect for tomatoes or other vegstable or fruit with a strong skin. Our first knife is about six years old and still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bard

customer_reviews.title: Bent
customer_reviews.text: Very noticeably has a bend to the left. If I could've inspected it in person I never would've bought it, though I am a bit of a perfectionist. It probably works fine, but I hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Andri

customer_reviews.title: Im a knife snob
customer_reviews.text: This knife makes the cut! Haha but for real sliced through tomatoes like butter. I keep it my lunchbag and use it on everything and thanks to the sweet sheath i don't have to remeber to protect my hand every time i reach for another snack
customer_reviews.author: emily crossman

customer_reviews.title: Good little knife
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say, good little serrated knife for small jobs. I used it to cut some French bread and it made deep gouges in my bamboo cutting board,( thats a good thing as far as the knife goes). Cuts the fruits and veggies clean, would be a good knife for acidic fruits as you don't want to dull your chef knife with the acid.
customer_reviews.author: The World's Greatest

customer_reviews.title: Best tomato knife ever!
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is the third knife I have purchased like this. My sister loved it so much she put it on this years wish list. She having a tomato garden this knife gets ton of use. I also have one and believe it's the best tomato slicer I have ever used and owned.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Scolaro

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp, which is a double-edged attribute.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, convenient, very very sharp. Watch out - it's deceptive, looks like a butter knife but oh those teeth. It cuts like a dream I quickly bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: L. Silver

customer_reviews.title: You can't beat this sharp little number in the kitchen ...
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat this sharp little number in the kitchen. Not only for tomatoes, but several other foods too! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Collis

customer_reviews.title: a beauty knife
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, sharp cutting knife, designed with elegance, truly German refinement. The actual color is lighter than the one shown in picture. Bright, but softened red. The stainless steel is of high quality, light and pure. Right size, lean and sleek. I just adore it. It serves me well and would be a nice addition to treat my friends when they come over and enjoy some bread, cheese and salad with me. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: choco

customer_reviews.title: Really works well
customer_reviews.text: This little knife is incredible! Wonderful clean slices of fresh tomatoes. A bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful Specialized Knife
customer_reviews.text: This is an ideal knife for slicing tomatoes to the thickness desired. It is light, has a good handle, is sharp and will stay sharp due to its design. Also, it is great for slicing cucumbers, squash, zucchini, peppers and other veggies and fruits.
customer_reviews.author: Kaspar

customer_reviews.title: homegrown tomatoes - works beautifully. Love that it has a sheath
customer_reviews.text: We use this knife to cut our fresh, homegrown tomatoes - works beautifully. Love that it has a sheath.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A Hemus

customer_reviews.title: The best vegetable knife
customer_reviews.text: I had a 35-year old Kitchen devil knife, bought in the UK. I used it every day and when it recently disappeared, I tried several replacements. Messermeister was the only one that didn't cut my fingers, ever! It is easy to get used to and to cut vegetables very fast. I recommend it for anyone regularly cutting vegetables, especially tomatoes.
customer_reviews.author: David Salomon

customer_reviews.title: Best knife. This is our second one because we ...
customer_reviews.text: Best knife. This is our second one because we use both all of the time. Great for some fruits like tomatoes and peaches; pierces the skin without smashing the fruit.
customer_reviews.author: batkin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this little knife, it does what it's designed to do
customer_reviews.author: GoreeDesi

customer_reviews.title: Great little knife
customer_reviews.text: After dozens of apples (this is my lunchtime apple knife) it is still very sharp and continues to cut very well. The sheath helps in transporting back & forth from home to work without puncturing the liner of my lunch bag. VERY happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great serated Paring knife.
customer_reviews.text: Great to find on Amazon, as we lost our original. My wife loves this knife and uses it for everything in kitchen prep.
customer_reviews.author: A. L. Connell

customer_reviews.title: Very good serrated knife to cut soft veggies and fruits.
customer_reviews.text: This knife has a good design that its easy to hold. It works best to cut soft fruits and vegetables. Its sharp. I have been using this from a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: prasin

customer_reviews.title: I Absolutely Love this Knife
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what it is about this knife, but I absolutely love it. I've owned some really expensive knives in the past, but so far this is the best knife I've come across yet. It is definitely my favorite, so I plan on buying some more Messermeister knives real soon.
customer_reviews.author: RackEmUp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little knife
customer_reviews.text: What do we expect, it is German made. Very sharp little knife, perfect for tomatoes. Love the little protective sheath. Nice size for small hands. Prompt service, pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: smilin29

customer_reviews.title: This knife is amazing! But be careful
customer_reviews.text: This knife is amazing! But be careful, it razor sharp! The price was amazing. I use it on tomatoes and other small veggies almost every day. 12.25.15--An update just to repeat how useful and superbly useful this little knife is!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tomato Slicer
customer_reviews.text: As it's name states, this knife a is perfect for slicing tomatoes. I can cut as thin a slice as I want. The handle is broad enough for good grip. I bought two of them. I kept one and gave the other to my mom. She also was amazed at the perfect slicing.
customer_reviews.author: Bansi

customer_reviews.title: Great for tomatoes. Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Nifty little knife. Works great. I had one for years that suddenly disappeared, so I bought two more. I do 't think they are the same brand, but they are well made and do the same great job. You can slice tomatoes really thin, if you need to.
customer_reviews.author: KTZ

customer_reviews.title: Tomato Knife.
customer_reviews.text: Can't live without this knife. Always sharp. Cuts tomatoes any which way wil ease. Even paper thin..
customer_reviews.author: Hylda Sogolow

customer_reviews.title: Best knife I ever had and the only knife I ...
customer_reviews.text: Best knife I ever had and the only knife I must have when I am in the kitchen. So it never goes to the dishwasher. May be I should buy some more.
customer_reviews.author: Sursur C.

customer_reviews.title: Best $13 I ever spent
customer_reviews.text: How did I survive without a tomato knife for so long? I just cut my first tomato with this knife and I can never go back. Best $13 I ever spent.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Good everyday knife for basic kitchen chores, also nice when slicing tomatoes
customer_reviews.text: Some years back I bought a set of little knives that included a serrated blade. That one seems to have vanished into the ether, and I decided to replace it not long ago. Why'd I wait so long? So handy to have a serrated blade for certain applications.
customer_reviews.author: An Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cuts tomatoes great, be careful it will cut you if you get to close
customer_reviews.author: George A Wheeler Jr

customer_reviews.title: Handy dandy tool.
customer_reviews.text: The little knife is a life saver for me. I've always had trouble slicing tomatoes but with this little knife slicing tomatoes is made simple.
customer_reviews.author: nightingale

customer_reviews.title: My favorite knife
customer_reviews.text: I have one knife like this that is perfect for cutting up meat and most other food on butcher's block. So, of course it is often in the dishwasher where I can't easily get to it. The solution was to get another. This is just as good as the first one.
customer_reviews.author: David Lee

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This knife is flimsy! The metal can be bent easily. Very very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

customer_reviews.title: This knife is perfect for almost everything!
customer_reviews.text: We use this knife and the other 3 like it for preparation, sandwich making and even with our regular silverware. I prefer the rounded end for dipping out condiments. It stays sharp. It feels good to hold. the red color is great, although I'd buy some other colors if they made them. One caution is to be a little gentle with this tool; I did one by forcing it through something frozen!
customer_reviews.author: Shernetz

customer_reviews.title: Very handy knife
customer_reviews.text: I use this knife for almost all my food cutting. I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: WEC International

customer_reviews.title: perfect knife
customer_reviews.text: The knife is just perfect to cut up tomato, avocado, carrots... this brand will become my favorite besides Wusthof. I can hardly tell which brand that I am using at all. Good buy for the money...
customer_reviews.author: samsam

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tomato knife. Very good quality and cuts tomatoes, lemons, and many other vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: babs21

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The plastic case that comes with this makes if very safe for storage. It is quite sharp and does a terrific job of cutting tomatoes. I bought 2 more as gifts after I had purchased my own.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Nice knife
customer_reviews.text: Great tomato knife. Like the cover on it to- slides right in. Very sharp
customer_reviews.author: Lili Patch

customer_reviews.title: Slice them 'maters !
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sharp. Just made myself a big salad, and pretty fast!
customer_reviews.author: Dee-Dee

customer_reviews.title: Makes perfect slices!
customer_reviews.text: Great for slicing tomatoes, Lemons, Limes. I use it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie s.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these knives!! I got one as a gift and keep buying them for friends. Great knife!
customer_reviews.author: M.H.

customer_reviews.title: It works but the handle is weak.
customer_reviews.text: I like the color, it slices tomatoes well, but it isn't as sturdy as the last one I had that disappeared into a black hole. I don't expect this one to last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Linsan53

customer_reviews.title: It's my favorite knife for slicing tomatoes
customer_reviews.text: It's my favorite knife for slicing tomatoes. Comes with a plastic protection blade cover. Always wash/rinse by hand so it remains sharp and keep blade covered when stored.
customer_reviews.author: pjkate

customer_reviews.title: Good buy...
customer_reviews.text: Very good knife, convenient sheath. Good for citrus as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley J Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Great knife!
customer_reviews.text: bought it as a gift; the rcipient loves it! It's lightweight but sturdy, and cuts easily through tomatoes without squeezing them.
customer_reviews.author: dot

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little knife
customer_reviews.text: Great size and super sharp. Good knife for cooking with kids too. The sheath is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gil

customer_reviews.title: Great little knife
customer_reviews.text: Lovely and sharp! So sharp, in fact, that it kind of digs into some of our wooden cutting boards, but whatever. Great addition for the price.
customer_reviews.author: marshlight

customer_reviews.title: the best knife ever for the price
customer_reviews.text: the best knife ever for the price. My wife has had the same exact knife for more than 15 years. It is her go to knife for everything from peeling vegetables cutting bread to cutting meat
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Ford

customer_reviews.title: knive
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife. It's very sharp. It cuts tomatoes easily anad because the tip is rounded it can be used as a spreader too.
customer_reviews.author: isobel

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful knife.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these knives for myself, family and friends. Wonderful knife....won't need another.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Grecoe

customer_reviews.title: But I love this knife for cutting tomatoes
customer_reviews.text: I didn't need any more knives. But I love this knife for cutting tomatoes. It's light, cheap, and long enough for larger tomatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Schlitze

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This knife cuts easy and perfectly. I would easily recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: alisha

customer_reviews.title: 4-1/2-Inch Serrated Tomato Knife with Matching Sheath, Red
customer_reviews.text: Just an every day knige. Flexes too much on peeling but grip is great. I still use my old Henkels.
customer_reviews.author: totehot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect knife have 10 of them. ordered on Amazon on Wednesday, arrived next day. Yikes Amazon thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great knife - not just for tomatoes! Every kitchen should have one!
customer_reviews.author: fran

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product !
customer_reviews.text: I chose this 5 start review because the knife does an excellent job of slicing tomatoes and is very well made ! thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Grohmann

customer_reviews.title: Tried and Tested
customer_reviews.text: The blade is a little short! But sharp and cuts tomatoes nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Lanelle Bishop

customer_reviews.title: sweet cut
customer_reviews.text: had one before and buying another, sharp as expected and love their sheath for protection and safety. a nice tool
customer_reviews.author: jwsc

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good!
customer_reviews.text: OMG. How did I ever get by without one of these...the only wish I have is a sharp point to remove the stem.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Young

customer_reviews.title: tomato knife
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife for slicing tomatoes, the color also reminds me not to use it for other slicing jobs. I keep it strictly for tomato prep.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Bambenek

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful knives
customer_reviews.text: We were given one of these knives especially for slicing tomatoes and other fruits but have purchased more because they are good for cutting a lot of other foods as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice fot the Price, and it really does a great job !
customer_reviews.author: M Elizondo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Slices tomatoes very thin. Peels them perfectly. In the South everyone needs one in the summertime for homegrown tomatoes.
customer_reviews.author: abt

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says it will do, it will slice tomatoes as thin as I want it to. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Epperly

customer_reviews.title: one of the best tomato knife
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tomato knife ever, you can make slice the width you want with such an ease, and no sharpening needed ever!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Maurice

customer_reviews.title: It cuts well. However it wasn't what I was ...
customer_reviews.text: It cuts well. However it wasn't what I was looking for. I wanted a small pairing knife. It is too big to pair an Apple.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: fair
customer_reviews.text: This knife was ok, after hearing reviews I was kinda hyped but I already have sharp knives so I kinda wasted my moneys. My mistake, I'll make sure I use it though.
customer_reviews.author: coachman08

customer_reviews.title: Best Tomato Cutter EVER
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this little knife. I thought it wouldn't be any good but boy was I surprised. I use it almost every day. It cuts my vegetables, especially the tomatoes so good, I can't believe it. I keep it on my drain board because I use it constantly. I am so glad I got this. I have mini tomatoes growing outside in a pot and they are hard to cut, but this little knife breezes right thru perfect for my salad. Probably should order another one to keep as a spare. Thanks for a little great wonderful item.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Knight

customer_reviews.title: Love this knife for tomatoes and so much more
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest tomato knife. I had one like that in Germany and was so happy to find it here. I have lots of knives, some are expensive but this inexpensive serrated knife is my favorite. I use it for tomatoes of course and it slices them without crushing them but I use it for taking the tops of eggs, cutting lemons, oranges, anything that's hard to cut with a regular knife.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula

customer_reviews.title: One of the best knives in my arsenal
customer_reviews.text: I've owned 2 of these knives over the past 15-20 years. One of them broke at the tang after many many years of hard use, so I docked it a star on durability but that's not really fair for a $8 knife. Otherwise I LOVE this knife. When I hand it to other people to cut some citrus, it blows their mind. Professional bartenders immediately go buy one. I should buy 6 of them. Don't pay $16 for this knife though..someone is jacking up the price around xmas since this is a perfect stocking stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: Chris McEliece

customer_reviews.title: Top surface is sharp enough to cut you!
customer_reviews.text: I can't understand how they are sending these knives out without dulling (or whatever the technical term is) the top surface of the blade itself - that anyone might often put their hand on when cutting something like a potato or carrot. You could easily cut yourself. I wanted to love this knife, but that sharp top surface is freaking me out.
customer_reviews.author: A thoughtful purchaser

customer_reviews.title: I thought my husband was nuts for getting this just for tomatoes when he could have used a steak knife...
customer_reviews.text: I thought my husband was nuts for getting this just for tomatoes when he could have used a steak knife... Then I used it once.. It really does go through alot easier. If doing it on a paper plate, it will "shred" the plate. If doing it toward your finger, be VERY CAREFUL its really sharp with serrated edges. I stop before going through the "skin" of the tomato (or mine) and then just pull apart so it won't cut me.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie KabelaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Best Tomatoe knife!
customer_reviews.text: This is the great little knife. It’s very sharp and sliced through anything. Love the red color so can find easily in a drawer. Love the cover to protect fingers from getting cut in drawer. Very sturdy and easy to handle. Great gift for anyone! I Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Susann B

customer_reviews.title: Clean Slicing
customer_reviews.text: Watch out for fingers, because this sharp, thin blade will slice through tomatoes cleanly, and almost anything you don’t want crushed when slicing. Even works great on hard boiled eggs. This is my 2nd one. The first disappeared and I was in a panic.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A. Shivers

customer_reviews.title: Great tomato knife
customer_reviews.text: For the price and steel of blade, it is an excellent knife for what it's intended for. I use it on most veggies of course except for hard ones like potatoes and ontions. Will purchase a few more as I always use it and often find it in the dishwasher or dirty sink.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Love this tomato knife
customer_reviews.text: The knife's sheath is a great feature that ensures you don't cut yourself while removing the knife from the drawer. I love tomato knives and the ability to easily slice tomatoes very thinly and evenly. One of the few speciality items I keep in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: ChrystinP

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight yet feels like good quality. Cuts open avocadoes and slices tomatoes well and I imagine it works well for many other fruits and veggies too. Not sturdy enough for dense things like raw root vegetables though in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: my go-to knife for tomatoes
customer_reviews.text: This little knife is my go-to for slicing tomatoes and other soft veggies and fruits - and breads and rolls. Great price for a trusty knife. It's really sharp, so pay attention.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly A. Hertle

customer_reviews.title: Handy little knife.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expect to love this knife as much as I do now. Initially bought this on a whim just for slicing cherry tomatoes, but I have reached for it time and again for many other slicing tasks in the kitchen like for fruit, bread and vegetables... this little guy hasn't let me down yet! The knife feels light and I sometimes joke with hubby that it will snap if I put too much force into it, but hey for $10 I wasn't expecting much, but it is sharp and does its job well and that alone makes it the best $10 I have ever spent!
customer_reviews.author: oscularity

customer_reviews.title: Good, could be great
customer_reviews.text: I go through a lot of tomatoes at home and was looking for a reasonably priced, proper knife. I tried another Messermeister knife, the one with the cutouts on the blade, but found it better with cheese than tomatoes. My office has a similar knife in our kitchen and it's the one everyone always reaches for. I'm very happy with the knife, the only thing preventing me from rating it 5 stars is that the blade could be longer. I find that it won't reach all the way across a average size beefsteak tomato; a longer blade would be much more versatile.
customer_reviews.author: MET

customer_reviews.title: sharp
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably sharp and useful. Rips right through tomatoes, but very good for a number of fruits and vegetables. I have been using serrated knives on tomatoes for years, but this one is 10 stars good.
customer_reviews.author: sewcrow

customer_reviews.title: Have one gave two as gifts
customer_reviews.text: Had one for over 4 years now, my go to knife for veggies and hard to cut tomatoes....great knife, even with a expensive knife set this still holds its place and is super useful daily used knife. Go to gift now for new home owners.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos and the law

customer_reviews.title: Love the red and case!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty darn sharp...cut my finger. Use only for tomatoes so that I will always have a sharp knife!
customer_reviews.author: 🌹ROSE🌷

customer_reviews.title: Go-to knife for everything.
customer_reviews.text: This little sharp light-weight knife turns out to be the most generally useful one around the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great for tomatoes and very sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect knife for cutting tomatoes or anything of a similar variety, just be very cautious when handling because it is very sharp, and those serrations are not forgiving!
customer_reviews.author: KRL

customer_reviews.title: Great for cutting vegetables
customer_reviews.text: Great vegetable knife like so much have bought more for our house as it s the go to knife and bought one for my daughter
customer_reviews.author: Merry

customer_reviews.title: Best Tomato Knife!
customer_reviews.text: Bought fit my hubby who LOVES, LOVES tomatoes. Knife is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Raymond

customer_reviews.title: great sharp serrated knife
customer_reviews.text: Messermeister tomato knife: love the sheath as this knife is extremely sharp! Already had one, wanted another. Very happy with merchant and item. The red color helps me find it among other knives
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Quickly became my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I read about these on ‘what to bring back with you from Germany and ordered from Amazon. Immediately became my favorite knife. My others include WMF, Victorinox, Cusineart ceramic, others with Solingen blades and common US brands. Very sharp, so be careful. Get it, you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: N K

customer_reviews.title: good tomato knife
customer_reviews.text: It's just like the knife (same brand) I bought ten years ago. Only difference is the original knife was made in Germany while this one is "German steel" but made in Portugal. It's very sharp. My only question is how long the blade will maintain its edge.
customer_reviews.author: Malinger Now

customer_reviews.title: Best knife ever
customer_reviews.text: I was gifted this knife and have since bought two more. I use it for everything!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Murphy

product_meta.title: Messermeister Handcrafted Serrated Tomato Knife with Matching Sheath, Red, 4.5-Inch
product_meta.description:
Color:RedThe Messermeister Petite Messer Knife Line is designed to be the perfect weight and size for handling all the light duty chopping, slicing and dicing of smaller fruits, vegetables, meats and breads. The ergonomic handles provide a secure, comfortable grip and the thin razor sharp blades cut with precision. Each fine edge prep blade is light-weight, maneuverable and the right size for today's quick prep culinary artists.

The Messermeister 4.5" Serrated Tomato Knife is one of our most popular specialty knives! This knife slices food that has a tough exterior and a softer middle, such as tomatoes or salami, with ease and precision. It includes a matching plastic sheath for chefs on-the-go and storage protection.
feature_bullets: Includes a matching plastic sheath for on-the-go and, also, for protection
